synopsis: In this engaging episode of Pineapple Blunt Rotation, hosts Devam and Ahir, along with their guest Garrett, dive deep into the complexities of body image and the gym culture. They share personal experiences, challenge societal norms, and emphasize the importance of self-acceptance and enjoying the journey of fitness, all while sprinkling humor and insightful commentary throughout.
quotes: The horror is persistent, but so do we.
You need to enjoy what you're doing and have fun doing it.
If you think fat shaming will motivate someone to lose weight, you're ignoring the issue.
Comparison is the thief of joy.
Don't force yourself to go to the gym if you really hate it; find something active that you enjoy.
It's important to set realistic goals for yourself.
Drink more water; it will change your life.
If you're going to the gym to improve the way you look, you should also be going because it's something you enjoy.
If you don't love the body you have right now, you're never going to love the body you turn into.
